name: Totem Elements
description:
Totem Elements is a matching puzzle game. There is an in game tutorial to play through to learn the rules.  Basically, you need to line up like-colored/shaped totem pieces and ultimately destroy all of the totem bases on each level before advancing to the next. However, the farther you progress in the game, the more challenges are thrown your way. You will have to battle the elements of Ice, Fire, and Wind as well as defuse elemental bombs.

There are two modes of play, Casual and Arcade.  Casual gives you a set number of Totem drops to attempt to finish the level with.  Casual mode is pretty relaxing, it provides you plenty of time to think about your next few moves.  Arcade mode is more hectic.  The Totems will drop on a timer and you have to finish before your allotted time runs out.  Hitting combos will give you a little more time though, so aim for those and you should do fine.

Hope you enjoy!
